column3: [' (StepDescription: crack-crack one egg in a bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add the chopped cilantro to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non-stick frying pan)']
[' (StepDescription: cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down until they start to soften and colour)']
[' (StepDescription: Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: add-1/2 tsp ground black pepper to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: put-put tomatoes on a serving plate)']
[' (StepDescription: Pour-Pour the egg mixture into the pan)']

column4: ErrorDescription:Stirred gently such that uncooked egg is transferred to the sides of the pan )
column5: (StepDescription: stir-stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: stir-stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that uncooked egg flows into the sides of the pan)']

column3: [" (StepDescription: Stop-Stop stirring when it's nearly cooked to allow it to set into an omelette)"]
[' (StepDescription: Transfer-Transfer omelette to the plate and serve with the tomatoes)']
